subject: Re: [junit] JUnit, ORBacus, ClassLoader
msgSnippet: I use junit.swingui.TestRunner.  I believe ORBacus JAR file is in both CLASSPATH and the JDK extension area. Today I noticed that the junit.textui.TestRunner
messageBody:
I use junit.swingui.TestRunner. I believe ORBacus' JAR file is in both
CLASSPATH and the JDK extension area.

Today I noticed that the junit.textui.TestRunner also worked when I had the
Properties file in my home directory which sets the same parameter the checkbox
exposes.

Al Sjogren

Jason Rogers wrote:

> A little more info would be nice. Which UI are you using that supports the
> checkbox you mention?
>
> -Jason
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Al Sjogren [mailto:asjogren@...]
> > Sent: Thursday, June 21, 2001 1:52 AM
> > To: JUnit ListServer
> > Subject: [junit] JUnit, ORBacus, ClassLoader
> >
> >
> > When I uncheck "Reload Classes every run" my tests work
> > correctly. If
> > not
> > I get the Java ORB instead of the ORBacus ORB causing a
> > ClassCastException.
> >
> > Why?
> >
> > I have a circumvention now. I'm just curious.
> >
> > Al Sjogren
> > Seattle
> >
